text: Cheris Salano Avilia (born 11 December 1989), known as Cheris Salano, is a Kenyan footballer who plays for Spedag and the Kenya national team. She played for Kenya at the 2016 Africa Women Cup of Nations, scoring for Kenya in the match against Mali. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Kenyan women's footballers Category:Kenya women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Cheris Avilia
